summary: This document contains a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from November 1 to November 30, 2017. It details deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting significant cash transfers during the month.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfrid
persons.context: Stewart Oldfrid is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Cash Transfers
events.description: Multiple cash transfers were made from the account, totaling $250,000.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $25.79 was credited to the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $314,610.75 and an ending balance of $64,636.54 as of November 30, 2017.
A total of $250,000 was withdrawn from the account through cash transfers during November 2017.
No service charges were incurred during the statement period.
The account earned an interest payment of $25.79 for the month.
Stewart Oldfrid is the contact person for inquiries related to the account.
